dct_title_s: Map of the United States : corrected from the most authentic sources and published for Darby and Dwight's Gazetteer.
dct_description_sm: E. Huntington, sc.;Includes "A Table showing the distance from Washington to the capital or largest town of each state..."; Oregon Territory.;Relief shown by hachures.;1 map, colored;33 x 50 cm.;ca. 1:8,000,000
